§l     Wondering what that difficulty bar that occasionally pops up means? Here is some information regarding that!§r


§nGaining difficulty§r

+1 for sleeping

+1 for every boss killed

+0.5 for every blight killed

+0.02 for every hostile mob killed

+0.004 for every passive mob killed


§nLunar multipliers§r

New moon: 1.1

Waxing crescent: 1.3

First quarter: 1.5

Waxing gibbous: 1.7

Full moon: 2.0

Waning gibbous: 1.7

Last quarter: 1.5

Waning crescent: 1.3


§nGamestage Multipliers§r

As you progress through the chapters, the actual amount of difficulty gained gets multiplied based on what chapter you are in as well as a few other non central gamestages. The multiplier is double your current chapter in addition to the following:

[gamestage] shopper: x1.5 after the chapter multipliers have been applied

[gamestage] emc: x1.5 after the chapter and shopper multipliers have been applied


§nMultiplayer Difficulty§r

On servers, difficulty is scaled by §lWEIGHTED_AVERAGE§r which means that the total difficulty is the average of all nearby players with closer players having more of an impact on the calculation


§nHealth & XP§r

- You lose 1 max health every time you die with a minimum boundary of 10 HP or 5 hearts not including XP bonuses

- You lose 2% of your total XP every time you die

- The health cap for player not including XP bonuses is 350

- The health cap for mobs is 32768


§nDifficulty Scaling (per level)§r

Non-Player Entity Attack Strength Multiplier: +0.01

Hostile Entity Health Multiplier: +0.1

Passive Entity Health Multiplier: +0.01

XP Multiplier for Killing Entities: +0.005

Blight Chance Multiplier: +0.25 [The formula is multiplier*(difficulty/max_dfficulty)]


§nBlighted Mobs§r

Attack Strength Amplifier: 3

Speed Amplifier: 3

Difficulty Multiplier: 2

XP Multiplier: 20

Armor Chance +0.5

Item Chance +0.5

Default Equipment Tier Iron

Equipment Tier Up Chance 0.1
